data.title: British Genealogy & Family History Forums
data.meta_description:
I've been looking through death certficates and causes of death and, like another posting here, I've found two suicides whilst suffering 'temporary insanity' - one of a chap whose wife was 7 months pregnant with their 16th child! 
 
However, in tracking the causes of death of the five children (of the 16) who died there is an 1890 one who seems to have died of "Congenital Syphilis ?? through vaccination'.  This is the cause of death given and the ?? represent a squiggle which may, or may not,
data.text:
